title: knbs-open-data-api
description: A RESTful API providing structured access to Kenya National Bureau of Statistics datasets for analysis and visualization.

title: kenya-counties-api
description: Fast and reliable REST API serving demographic, economic, and spatial data for all counties in Kenya, enabling data-driven applications.

title: geocoding-standardization-microservice
description: A microservice that standardizes addresses and performs geocoding for accurate mapping and spatial analysis in applications.

title: go-financial-aggregator
description: A Go-based personal finance aggregator that consolidates transactions from multiple sources and provides insights using AI-driven analytics.

title: echoGraph
description: A personal music tracking and analytics platform inspired by Last.fm and AirbudsFM, allowing users to monitor listening habits, discover patterns, and receive smart recommendations.
